#### Contractor Business Data Report (CBDR, DD Form 1921-3)
The `r prime_vs_sub` shall prepare and submit the "Contractor Business Data Report (DD Form 1921-3)" in accordance with CDRL `r CBDR_CDRL_numb`. The "Contractor Business Data Report (DD Form 1921-3)" reports data to facilitate estimating and analysis of indirect contract costs and rates.
